projects.title: ClinicFlow
projects.description: A web-based tool designed to help physical therapy staff at the Sutter Palo Alto Medical Foundation quickly and easily visualize patient appointments and manage their schedules. With its user-friendly interface, this app provides a convenient and efficient solution for staff to visualize the volume of patients scheduled in a given hour, manually input patient data, and view a bar graph of the appointment data. Using React.js for front-end and Chart.js for charting, this app is the perfect tool for physical therapy staff at the Sutter Palo Alto Medical Foundation to manage their schedules.

projects.title: Add more sections!
projects.description: The starter includes predefined sections as well as a template for new, custom sections. Moreover, you can add new projects to this section without additional coding. Photo by Kelly Sikkema on Unsplash.
